fr.umlv.escape.bonus

Interface Bonus

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    WeaponReloader

    public interface Bonus
    Interface that all kind of bonus should implements. This interface contains all nesserary methods needed to manage a bonus.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Body getBody()
      Return the Body that represent the bonus in the EscapeWorld.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Return the name of the Bonus.
      int getPosXCenter()
      Return the x position of the center of the Bonus.
      int getPosYCenter()
      Return the y position of the center of the Bonus.
      int getQuantity()
      Return the quantity of the Bonus.
      java.lang.String getType()
      Return the type of the Bonus.
      void move()
      Method that move the bonus.
